Name: The Lost City
Star: Sandra Bullock, Brad Pitt, Daniel Radcliffe, Channing Tatum
Summary: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

Name: The King's Man
Star: Ralph Fiennes, Gemma Arterton, Rhys Ifans, Harris Dickinson
Summary: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Red Notice
Star: Dwayne Johnson, Ryan Reynolds, Gal Gadot, Ritu Arya
Summary: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief.

Name: Free Guy
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi, Lil Rel Howery
Summary: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

Name: Home Sweet Home Alone
Star: Ellie Kemper, Rob Delaney, Archie Yates, Aisling Bea
Summary: A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.

Name: The Suicide Squad
Star: Margot Robbie, Idris Elba, John Cena, Joel Kinnaman
Summary: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

Name: Cowboy Bebop
Star: John Cho, Mustafa Shakir, Daniella Pineda, Elena Satine
Summary: A ragtag crew of bounty hunters chases down the galaxy's most dangerous criminals. They'll save the world - for the right price.

Name: WandaVision
Star: Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Bettany, Kathryn Hahn, Teyonah Parris
Summary: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU, in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision - two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives - begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

Name: Cobra Kai
Star: Courtney Henggeler, Mary Mouser, Tanner Buchanan, Ralph Macchio
Summary: Decades after their 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament bout, a middle-aged Daniel LaRusso and Johnny Lawrence find themselves martial-arts rivals again.

Name: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Star: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson, Michael Caine
Summary: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Name: MacGruber
Star: Will Forte, Kristen Wiig, Ryan Phillippe, Laurence Fishburne
Summary: TV series based on the 'Saturday Night Live' sketch spoofing the hit 1980s action series 'MacGyver'.

Name: Home Alone 3
Star: Alex D. Linz, Olek Krupa, Rya Kihlstedt, Lenny von Dohlen
Summary: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

Name: Jungle Cruise
Star: Dwayne Johnson, Emily Blunt, Edgar Ramírez, Jack Whitehall
Summary: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.

Name: Archer
Star: H. Jon Benjamin, Judy Greer, Amber Nash, Chris Parnell
Summary: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

Name: Army of Thieves
Star: Matthias Schweighöfer, Nathalie Emmanuel, Ruby O. Fee, Stuart Martin
Summary: A prequel, set before the events of Army of the Dead, which focuses on German safecracker Ludwig Dieter leading a group of aspiring thieves on a top secret heist during the early stages of the zombie apocalypse.

Name: One Piece
Star: Mayumi Tanaka, Tony Beck, Laurent Vernin, Akemi Okamura
Summary: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Name: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
Star: Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Channing Tatum
Summary: After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organisation in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret organisations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

Name: Fatman
Star: Mel Gibson, Walton Goggins, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Chance Hurstfield
Summary: A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.

Name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse - Part One
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
Star: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac, Issa Rae
Summary: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Oscar®-winning Spider-Verse saga, an epic adventure that will transport Brooklyn's full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man across the ...                See full summary »

Name: Minnal Murali
Star: Tovino Thomas, Guru Somasundaram, Vasisht Umesh, Femina George
Summary: The film revolves around the main character of Jaison, played by Tovino Thomas, who is hit by a lightning and gets supernatural powers.The following events and situations form the basis of the film.

Name: The Gentlemen
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Charlie Hunnam, Michelle Dockery, Jeremy Strong
Summary: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

Name: Ghostbusters
Star: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis
Summary: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

Name: The Umbrella Academy
Star: Elliot Page, Tom Hopper, David Castañeda, Emmy Raver-Lampman
Summary: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
Star: Ben Schwartz, Idris Elba, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Jim Carrey
Summary: Sequel to the 2020 live-action feature film 'Sonic the Hedgehog'.

Name: Thor: Ragnarok
Star: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
Summary: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Name: Guardians of the Galaxy
Star: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana
Summary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Name: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
Star: Nicolas Cage, Pedro Pascal, Neil Patrick Harris, Tiffany Haddish
Summary: A cash-strapped Nicolas Cage agrees to make a paid appearance at a billionaire super fan's birthday party, but is really an informant for the CIA since the billionaire fan is a drug kingpin and gets cast in a Tarantino movie.

Name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Star: Matthew Mercer, David Vincent, Daisuke Ono, Unshô Ishizuka
Summary: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

Name: Deadpool
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller, Ed Skrein
Summary: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

Name: Rise of the Guardians
Star: Hugh Jackman, Alec Baldwin, Isla Fisher, Chris Pine
Summary: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

Name: Deadpool 2
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison
Summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Name: Doom Patrol
Star: Diane Guerrero, April Bowlby, Matt Bomer, Brendan Fraser
Summary: The adventures of an idealistic mad scientist and his field team of superpowered outcasts.

Name: Operation Fortune: Ruse de guerre
Star: Cary Elwes, Jason Statham, Hugh Grant, Aubrey Plaza
Summary: Special agent Orson Fortune and his team of operatives recruit one of Hollywood's biggest movie stars to help them on an undercover mission when the sale of a deadly new weapons technology threatens to disrupt the world order.

Name: Peacemaker
Star: John Cena, Robert Patrick, Jennifer Holland, Freddie Stroma
Summary: The origin of the DC superhero so dedicated to world peace that he is prepared to use force of arms to achieve it.

Name: Raya and the Last Dragon
Director: Don Hall, Carlos López Estrada, Paul Briggs, John Ripa
Star: Kelly Marie Tran, Awkwafina, Gemma Chan, Izaac Wang
Summary: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

Name: Cowboy Bebop
Star: Kôichi Yamadera, Unshô Ishizuka, Megumi Hayashibara, Steve Blum
Summary: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

Name: Bad Boys for Life
Star: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig
Summary: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

Name: Jumanji: The Next Level
Star: Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart, Karen Gillan
Summary: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

Name: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L. Jackson, Salma Hayek, Antonio Banderas
Summary: The bodyguard Michael Bryce continues his friendship with assassin Darius Kincaid as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

Name: My Hero Academia
Star: Daiki Yamashita, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ayane Sakura, Justin Briner
Summary: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

Name: She-Hulk
Star: Tatiana Maslany, Mark Ruffalo, Tim Roth, Jameela Jamil
Summary: Jennifer Walters acquires Hulk-like qualities.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog
Star: Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Jim Carrey, Tika Sumpter
Summary: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

Name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Star: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
Summary: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Name: Chuck
Star: Zachary Levi, Yvonne Strahovski, Joshua Gomez, Vik Sahay
Summary: When a twenty-something computer geek inadvertently downloads critical government secrets into his brain, the C.I.A. and the N.S.A. assign two agents to protect him and exploit such knowledge, turning his life upside down.

Name: Riders of Justice
Star: Mads Mikkelsen, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Andrea Heick Gadeberg, Lars Brygmann
Summary: Markus goes home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a tragic train accident. It seems like an accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.

Name: Barry
Star: Bill Hader, Stephen Root, Sarah Goldberg, Anthony Carrigan
Summary: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Name: RED
Star: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman, Mary-Louise Parker
Summary: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

Name: Naruto: Shippûden
Star: Junko Takeuchi, Maile Flanagan, Kate Higgins, Chie Nakamura
Summary: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

Name: 21 Jump Street
Star: Jonah Hill, Channing Tatum, Ice Cube, Brie Larson
Summary: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.
